title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Google Chrome Vulnerabilities

meta.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Google Chrome Vulnerabilities

sentences.html: April 12, 2022
Severity

chapters.title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Google Chrome Vulnerabilities

sentences.html: High

sentences.text: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free in storage. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service condition on the system.
sentences.html: Google Chrome could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free in storage.
